Direct Known Subclasses:
Base64Decoder, Base64Encoder, PSAddPortalProperties, PSCloneOverrideField, PSCmsObjectNameLookup, PSConvertDate, PSCreatePortalPropertyList, PSGenerateAssemblerLink, PSGeneratePubLocation, PSGetBase64Encoded, PSGetFileSize, PSLocalizeDate, PSLocalizeDateToUser, PSLocalizedTextLookup, PSLocalizedTextLookupUser, PSMakeAbsLink, PSMakeAbsLinkSecure, PSMakeAbsLinkSecureEx, PSMakeInternalRequest, PSMakeIntLink, PSMakeLink, PSPublishableContent, PSQueryExtensions, PSRhythmyxRoot, PSSimpleJavaUdf_add, PSSimpleJavaUdf_cloneTitle, PSSimpleJavaUdf_concat, PSSimpleJavaUdf_dateAdjust, PSSimpleJavaUdf_dateFormat, PSSimpleJavaUdf_dateFormatEx, PSSimpleJavaUdf_decodeURL, PSSimpleJavaUdf_divide, PSSimpleJavaUdf_encodeForUrl, PSSimpleJavaUdf_literal, PSSimpleJavaUdf_multiply, PSSimpleJavaUdf_overrideLiteral, PSSimpleJavaUdf_replace, PSSimpleJavaUdf_subtract, PSSimpleJavaUdf_toHash, PSSimpleJavaUdf_toLowerCase, PSSimpleJavaUdf_toProperCase, PSSimpleJavaUdf_toUpperCase, PSStringTrimmerUdf, PSSuperConcat, PSTextToXml, PSValidateFile, PSValidateString
public abstract class PSSimpleJavaUdfExtension
extends Object
implements IPSUdfProcessor

A simple abstract class that has a default implementation for the IPSExtension interface methods. By default save the parameters passed in the init method, making them available to derived classes via protected access.

Since:
1.1
Version:
2.0
Author:
Jian Huang

Field Detail

m_def

protected IPSExtensionDef m_def
This is the definition for this extension. You may want to use it for validation purposes in the processUdf method.

m_codeRoot

protected File m_codeRoot
This value contains the 'root' directory for this extension. When installed, all files are installed relative to this location. Files can be loaded from anywhere under this directory and no where else (by default, the actual security policy may vary). This object could be used to load a property file when executing the UDF.

Constructor Detail

PSSimpleJavaUdfExtension

public PSSimpleJavaUdfExtension()
Method Detail

init

public void init(IPSExtensionDef def,
                 File codeRoot)
          throws PSExtensionException
This is a default implementation that does nothing except save the input values in protected local storage for use by derived classes.

See init for details.

Specified by:
init in interface IPSExtension
Parameters:
def - The extension def, which contains configuration info and initialization params.
codeRoot - The root directory where this extension should install and look for any files relating to itself. The subdirectory structure under codeRoot is left up to the extension implementation. Must not be null.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the codeRoot does not exist, or is not accessible. Also thrown for any other initialization errors that will prohibit this extension from doing its job correctly, such as invalid or missing properties.
